meanings.definition: A small piece of food that has been coated in batter and fried
meanings.sent1: Mom made delicious apple fritters for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: I ordered some banana fritters at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The fritters disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The fritters sizzled in the hot oil.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly fried fritters filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To waste time or money on unimportant things
meanings.sent1: Stop frittering away your time on video games.
meanings.sent2: She fritters her money on unnecessary gadgets.
meanings.sent3: He always fritters his time on social media.
meanings.sent4: Don't fritter your savings on frivolous purchases.
meanings.sent5: They fritter their resources on meaningless projects.

meanings.definition: To break or tear something into small pieces
meanings.sent1: The dog frittered the paper into bits.
meanings.sent2: She fritters the bread into crumbs for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The wind frittered the leaves into the air.
meanings.sent4: The waves fritter the sand along the shore.
meanings.sent5: He fritters the clay into tiny pieces for pottery.
